title: impetuoso : It's thanks to you guys

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Nnnnggh… Yeah, that bit of hair's definitely gone a little frizzy. Yikes… Did I sleep on it funny? Can I fix this…?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
(Actually, if I don't fix this, I'm screwed! 
I mean, today's… today's the day…!)

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Oh, morning, Kuu-chan. 
It's finally time for the Chorus Fest, huh.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Y-yeah… Wait, huh? Kei-chan, I don't remember seeing that brooch before. It looks real nice… Did you just buy it?

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Oh, this? Ruby gave it to me. It's got this elegance to it. Makes me look a little more put together, doesn't it? 
…It's like she right here cheering us on.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: She's got a family meeting to go to, though, so she's not actually coming to see us. …Though Helios is! She told me she's bringing a bunch of her friends.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Whoa, if Helios-chan's inviting them, we're going to have a big crowd… Oh, speaking of, all my friends said they'd come too.

text_block_list.name: HIshi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
(…Wait. Huh? This isn't exactly a high-stakes contest, but… 
…I'm, like… actually getting…?)

text_block_list.name: Event Staff
text_block_list.text:
Okay, every group's got their lots drawn for the order! 
Be sure to be by the stage a bit before your turn!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: (Yeah, the vibes are definitely casual… The other groups look like they're just trying to have fun and not really tryhard. …But still——)

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text:
I- It's kinda… stressful, huh…!? 
When I think about how many friends are coming to watch, I just——!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
I get it!! I totally get it, Dantsu-chan!! 
…Oh crap. What do we do. I can already feel myself forgetting the lyrics…

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
D-don't say that, I'm starting to feel it too…! 
No, no. A knight must never allow herself to be shaken——

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: What am I going to do with you all? Why are you all so worried when you can sing at Winning Concerts just fine.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: Ngh… So you mean to say you are not the least bit anxious!?

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text:
No actually I am so anxious that it's scary. My heart is pounding really hard and it is not stopping at all. 
Fla-chan help me.

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text:
——Wait, by Fla-chan, do you mean me!? W-well… 
Looks like you're feeling the same way, huh, Light O-chan…?

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Haha. It's all going to be okay, guys. 
You know… You've all worked really hard up to today, remember?

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
So, your hearts might be pounding, and you may feel anxious… 
But in a way that just means you're motivated, right?

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, let's go with that. 
So you guys take that motivation—— And let it rip on the stage with everything you've got.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Don't worry about getting the lyrics a little wrong! 
If it comes to it, I'll just play the piano a little louder. 
——Got it?

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text: Miracle-senpai…

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text:
…You're right. We've done everything we can to prepare. 
All we have to do now is sing our hearts out and have a good time!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Ngh… L-let's make it happen, baby!!

text_block_list.name: Event Staff
text_block_list.text:
Okay, next up is Entry Number 9, Team Miraclez! 
Let's give them a big hand!

Is everyone ready? Three, two, one…! 
Go for it, Miraclez!!!!!
text_block_list.name: Kids from the hospital
K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
(Everyone…! …Looks like they managed to make it here without any problems. Thank goodness. 
All right… I hope you guys have fun——!)

text_block_list.name: Everyone
text_block_list.text:
Meet and part, we go by Say hello, wave goodbye 
A scene we'll never see again As we go walking 
Down the little road home

text_block_list.name: Everyone
text_block_list.text:
Those lonely little moments And all of the little pains 
I don't want to forget any of them ——

text_block_list.name: Child B
text_block_list.text:
Wow… Their singing is so pretty… 
They're sparkling…!

text_block_list.name: Child C
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, yeah! They're sparkling! I'm so excited!! 
Hey, big girls!! You're awesome!!

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text:
…! Miracle-senpai, look! 
Look how happy we made those kids…!

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text: And… They're so full of energy now!! Helios-senpai, her friends, my friends… Are they all having fun?

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: (Yeah… Thank goodness. Thank goodness! This, all of this—— Dantsu, Light O, Durandal. And Kuu-chan…)

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: (All of you… It's all thanks to you guys——)

text_block_list.name: Event Staff
text_block_list.text: Okay, the results are in! The winner of today's Chorus Fest, the team that dazzled their way to the top is——

text_block_list.name: Event Staff
text_block_list.text: Team Miraclez!! They win the grand prize of an all-expenses-paid group vacation! Let's give them a great big hand!!

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: Yes that trip was so fun. My favorite parts were partying at the leisure center and completely destroying Durandal in a pillow fight. Oh so many sweet memories——

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: Please return to reality, Light O-san! Our trip is not until tomorrow!! And would you kindly refrain from destroying me in your delusions!?

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text: W-well, it's okay… For real, though, I can't wait for tomorrow! I'm really excited for our shopping trip together, too～

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: For real～♪ …That's why I wanted to spend our lunch break figuring out our shopping lists and where we want to meet up after school, but——

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: …Kei-chan's kind of late. I took a peek at her class, but I didn't see her… I guess she's got some stuff to do, so I just went ahead and——

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
! …Oh. Hello? 
What's up, Kei-chan? We're all waiting in the cafeteria——

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Sorry, Kuu-chan. 
I… I can't go on the trip anymore.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: ………Huh?

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
I was feeling kind of weird this morning… 
I just got it checked, and my fever's gotten pretty bad.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
I don't think I'll be better by tomorrow… 
…Sorry.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Oh, it's all right, you don't need to apologize for this! 
O-okay, so, umm…! Let's just cancel tomorrow! Yeah. 
We can always go some other time——

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
…Excuse me, Hishi Miracle-san. 
Loath as I am to say it, I do not believe we can.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: If I recall their explanation, if we cancel our plans for personal reasons, then we cannot apply the same voucher on another date.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Ngh… Really…? 
Uhhhh… Then how about… How about……

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
It's okay. I'm glad you're being considerate, Kuu-chan. 
But you don't have to feel sorry for me. I'll be fine.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
You guys can go have fun on the trip. 
You don't need to worry about me. Really.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
…? 
Uh, Kuu-chan——

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: …No, it's not.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: Huh…?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. I was really looking forward to the trip. 
…I was so excited to go WITH you, Kei-chan.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
It's not about being considerate or whatever. 
…I just can't stand this!!

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
…! 
Ah… 
……………Kuu-chan——
